channel.title: Globals on www.mirkosertic.de
channel.description: Recent content in Globals on www.mirkosertic.de

item.title: Tools & Goodies
item.description: Technical stuff PlotJuggler PlotJuggler is a tool to visualize time series that is fast, powerful and intuitive. Dependency-Track Dependency-Track is an intelligent Component Analysis platform that allows organizations to identify and reduce risk in the software supply chain. Dependency-Track takes a unique and highly beneficial approach by leveraging the capabilities of Software Bill of Materials (SBOM). This approach provides capabilities that traditional Software Composition Analysis (SCA) solutions cannot achieve.

item.title: My personal list of interesting books
item.description: General software engineering & project management The Mythical Man-Month. Essays on Software Engineering. Frederick P. Brooks Requirements-Engineering und -Management: Professionelle, iterative Anforderungsanalyse für die Praxis. Chris Rupp und die SOPHISTEN The Deadline: A Novel About Project Management. Tom DeMarco The Goal: A Process of Ongoing Improvement. Eliyahu M. Goldratt, Jeff Cox Peopleware: Productive Projects and Teams. Tom DeMarco 97 Things Every Programmer Should Know Knigge für Softwarearchitekten. Peter Hruschka

item.title: My favorite postings
item.description: Here is a list of my favorite and evergreen postings so far: WebAssembly with vue.js Alice, Bob, Carol and Dave OpenCL Edition Object-Oriented WebAssembly Bytecoder : A Low Level Bytecode to JavaScript Transpiler A Domain-driven Design Example Improve Test Quality with Mutation Testing A JavaFX based Game Authoring System Why I switched to static HTML generators A JavaFX based Desktop Search Engine GWT vs. Dragome vs. TeaVM for Game Programming
